channel.title: [ 317 / PI ] Client Won't Load
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]CLIENT[/b][/size]
[code]Server is loading.. java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(Unknown Source) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.connect(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Unknown Source) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.openSocket(Client.java:2983) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.openJagGrabInputStream(Client.java:14535) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.connect(Client.java:1988) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.startUp(Client.java:11442) at com.ad.nauseam.RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:100) at com.ad.nauseam.Client.run(Client.java:8743) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/4f5e8841b1347902842dbe53d856297f.png[/img]
